alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 9:21PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Crawford County through 945 PM CDT... At 920 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Mountainburg, moving northwest at 10 to 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Chester... Lake Fort Smith... Lee Creek... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 23 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
